flawed_nl_solution:
The chickens cost $80 because 4 x 20 = <<4*20=80>>80
His chickens produce a dozen eggs a week because 4 x 3 = <<4*3=12>>12
Each week that he has chickens is $1 cheaper than buying eggs because 2 - 1 = <<2-1=5>>5
After 80 weeks his chickens will be paid off because 80 / 5 = <<80/5=16>>16
After 16 + 1 weeks the chickens will be cheaper than buying eggs because 16 + 1 = <<16+1=17>>17
#### 17

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
